id.description: The unique identifier for the signature

fileId.description: ID of the file that was signed

userId.description: ID of the user who created the signature

md5Hash.description: MD5 hash of the file content at the time of signing

signature.description: Cryptographic signature proving the user's agreement to the file

publicKey.description: User's public key for signature verification

message.description: Original message that was signed (usually contains file details)

updatedAt.description: When the signature was last updated
